author: MarÃ­a RamÃ­rez
title: SÃ­, se puede
text: Nada mÃ¡s perder las elecciones, Rishi Sunak pronunciÃ³ un discurso especialmente respetuoso y generoso con el rival, sin excusas ni peros ni advertencias. Esta semana, en la sesiÃ³n inaugural de la CÃ¡mara de los Comunes, el ya ex primer ministro dirigiÃ³ unas palabras parecidas a su sucesor, Keir Starmer, con una sonrisa incluso, y volviÃ³ a pedir perdÃ³n a los colegas que ya no estÃ¡n del Partido Conservador, tras la peor derrota de su historia. Sunak dice que ha llamado uno a uno a los 175 diputados conservadores que han perdido su escaÃ±o. Starmer le devolviÃ³ los elogios y subrayÃ³ que nunca se debe subestimar el esfuerzo extra de Sunak para haber llegado a la cÃºspide del poder polÃ­tico como britÃ¡nico-asiÃ¡tico. Puede que Sunak sÃ­ sienta respeto personal hacia Starmer y viceversa, pero lo que hace es sobre todo por el respeto a la democracia y a sus instituciones, algo bÃ¡sico y que poco a poco se estÃ¡ convirtiendo en llamativo en Europa y en Estados Unidos, los lugares donde las democracias estÃ¡n mÃ¡s consolidadas y donde los servidores pÃºblicos estÃ¡n jugando con fuego. En el Reino Unido, plagado de errores y penurias, la mayorÃ­a de los polÃ­ticos han hecho, sin embargo, un esfuerzo por mantener la lucha polÃ­tica en el plano que le corresponde: la rivalidad de ideas y de propuestas no la animadversiÃ³n entre personas que transpira de las formas mÃ¡s turbias al electorado. Por supuesto, hay ejemplos de lo contrario, como Boris Johnson, que dimitiÃ³ con un discurso pomposo que incluÃ­a crÃ­ticas a sus propios colegas y que se marchÃ³ forzado por su partido y su Gobierno. Y Nigel Farage, el lÃ­der del partido de extrema derecha Reform, que esta semana aprovechÃ³ su primera intervenciÃ³n en la inauguraciÃ³n del Parlamento para criticar al antiguo speaker por haber puesto trabas, segÃºn Ã©l, al acuerdo del Brexit. Farage fue abucheado por ello. Pero hay un mÃ­nimo aceptado de respeto a las instituciones que se nota en un electorado menos polarizado que en otros paÃ­ses, sobre todo respecto a la llamada polarizaciÃ³n afectiva, que consiste en odiar al rival por ser del equipo contrario mÃ¡s que por sus ideas. El problema del Reino Unido es ahora mÃ¡s la apatÃ­a, como me decÃ­a Luke Tryl, el director de More in Common, una encuestadora y proyecto cÃ­vico que me ha ayudado mucho para la cobertura de las elecciones britÃ¡nicas. La apatÃ­a es, sin duda, una seÃ±al seria de que habrÃ¡ problemas a medio plazo, pero tiene mejor soluciÃ³n que la divisiÃ³n partidista de los ciudadanos, las instituciones y cualquier bien comÃºn. Los polÃ­ticos tienen un papel esencial en sus elecciones cada dÃ­a, desde las palabras que usan a cÃ³mo tratan las instituciones. La cortesÃ­a y la defensa de las instituciones independientes, tambiÃ©n las incÃ³modas, las que sirven de control o las que estÃ¡n en manos de la oposiciÃ³n, son primeros pasos. Nada de eso es garantÃ­a de que los gobiernos no vayan a tomar decisiones equivocadas o los votantes se crean a vendemotos peligrosos. Pero las mÃºltiples voces expertas en democracia que he entrevistado en los Ãºltimos meses, como Sandra LeÃ³n, Ben Ansell o Steven Levitsky, ven por ahÃ­ un camino hacia la despolarizaciÃ³n. El respeto de las costumbres democrÃ¡ticas y de la independencia de las instituciones en forma y fondo puede ayudar en un momento de desconfianza popular en especial hacia los polÃ­ticos. Que los usos democrÃ¡ticos y las instituciones sean fuertes e independientes y tengan el respeto pÃºblico es esencial si llega un lÃ­der autoritario que quiera cargarse los contrapoderes y poner todo el aparato del Estado al servicio de sus intereses. Se puede hacer, pero hay que tener voluntad polÃ­tica para ello, al menos para empezar y sobre todo desde la posiciÃ³n de poder de los gobernantes. El respeto, igual que su ausencia, es contagioso. En este momento de desconcierto democrÃ¡tico y ascenso del autoritarismo dentro de las propias democracias, nadie tiene la varita mÃ¡gica. Pero lo que estÃ¡n haciendo estos dÃ­as los polÃ­ticos en el Reino Unido se parece mÃ¡s al camino posible que el que toman a diario sus colegas en EspaÃ±a y en otros vecinos europeos.

author: Benzinga
title: 'LINK Is On Fire Baby, Let's Go $20': Analysts Get Stoked As Chainlink Rallies 8% By Benzinga
text:
Â© Reuters. 'LINK Is On Fire Baby, Let's Go $20': Analysts Get Stoked As Chainlink Rallies 8% LINK/BTC -2.26% Add to/Remove from a Portfolio Add to Watchlist Add Position Position added successfully to:
Please name your holdings portfolio Type: BUY SELL Date: Amount: Price Point Value: Leverage: 1:1 1:10 1:25 1:50 1:100 1:200 1:400 1:500 1:1000 Commission: Create New Watchlist Create Create a new holdings portfolio Add Create + Add another position Close Benzinga - by Khyathi Dalal, Benzinga Staff Writer.
Whales are interested in Chainlink (CRYPTO: LINK), prompting analysts to turn bullish on the token â€” though some see it in a re-accumulation range.
What Happened : Based on LookOnChain data cited by crypto analyst Ali Martinez , Chainlink whales have gathered around 7 million LINK worth $105 million just over the past week. This highlights the rising confidence of major LINK players.
Data indicated that an unknown wallet address withdrew 136,146 LINK (worth $2.05 million) from Binance, taking its past 10-day withdrawal to 348,006 LINK (worth $5.79 million) from Binance.
The value indicates a floating profit of $229,000.
Read Next: Dogecoin, XRP Witness Significant Whale Activity: Analysts Expect 'Something Big'
Why It Matters : Rekt Capital , a cryptocurrency technical analyst, published a chart with technical analysis on X, asking: â€œWhat if Chainlink has been a Re-Accumulation range at highs all this time?â€
$LINKWhat if Chainlink has been a Re-Accumulation range at highs all this time?#LINK #Crypto #Chainlink pic.twitter.com/9iRb4oxhU1
â€” Rekt Capital (@rektcapital) December 27, 2023
For the unfamiliar, re-accumulation is a range-bound condition that forms after an uptrend. It is a pause or preparation phase for a fresh new leg of a larger uptrend.Futures Trader, Satoshi Flipper took to his X handle and said that â€œ$LINK is on fire baby let's gooo $20.â€
Later Flipper added that â€œTechnically the market wasn't wrong and $LINK did hit the top of the channel, almost $18 as presented on 12/21. Bottom of the channel is $14 ... a blessing for swing traders if we get it.â€
Bottom of the channel is $14 ... a blessing for swing traders if we get it 'LINK Is On Fire Baby, Let's Go $20': Analysts Get Stoked As Chainlink Rallies 8%

author: @netzwelt
title: Experten warnen: Diese 13 Apps mÃ¼sst ihr sofort lÃ¶schen
text:
AKTUELLE BETRUGSWARNUNGEN
Experten warnen: Diese 13 Apps mÃ¼sst ihr sofort lÃ¶schen
Millionenfach heruntergeladene Apps aus dem Google Play Store und App Store stellen eine Gefahr fÃ¼r euer Smartphone dar. Welche Anwendungen ihr lÃ¶schen solltet, verraten wir euch.
- Sicherheitsforscher haben 13 weit verbreitete Android- und iOS-Apps entdeckt, die unverschlÃ¼sselte Zugangsdaten zu Cloud-Diensten enthalten.
- Diese Schwachstelle erlaubt Angreifern, auf sensible Nutzerdaten zuzugreifen oder diese zu manipulieren.
- Um das Risiko eines Datenlecks zu vermeiden, solltet ihr die betroffenen Apps besser lÃ¶schen.
Immer wieder wird davor gewarnt, keine Apps aus dubiosen Quellen herunterzuladen. Denn mit hoher Wahrscheinlichkeit handelt es sich um eine getarnte Cyberbedrohung. Eine Untersuchung des Sicherheitsunternehmens Symantec zeigt allerdings, dass auch Anwendungen aus dem Google Play Store und Apples App Store eure Datensicherheit gefÃ¤hrden kÃ¶nnen. Insgesamt sind 13 Anwendungen betroffen, die teils millionenfach heruntergeladen wurden.
Die Gefahr dabei ist nicht sofort sichtbar. Denn es handelt sich nicht um klassische Malware, sondern um ein Sicherheitsproblem im Hintergrund. Die Apps enthalten fest einprogrammierte Zugangsdaten fÃ¼r Cloud-Dienste wie Amazon Web Services (AWS) und Microsoft Azure, was Angreifern TÃ¼r und Tor Ã¶ffnet.
 go.expressvpn.com ExpressVPN go.expressvpn.com 9,7 9,7 von 10 Punkten
ExpressVPN Ã¼berzeugt mit hoher Sicherheit, einfacher Bedienung und zuverlÃ¤ssiger Performance. Zwar gehÃ¶rt es preislich zur oberen Kategorie, doch der Funktionsumfang und der Fokus auf Datenschutz...
- Kostenlose Option: 30-Tage-Geld-zurÃ¼ck-Garantie
- Kostenlose Standorte: Alle LÃ¤nder und Serverstandorte
- BandbreitenbeschrÃ¤nkung: Keine BandbreitenbeschrÃ¤nkung
- Volumenbegrenzung: Keine Volumenbegrenzung
- Besonderheiten: Perfektes VPN fÃ¼r kostenloses Streaming im Urlaub
Mehr Infos.
 www.cyberghostvpn.com CyberGhost www.cyberghostvpn.com 9,6 9,6 von 10 Punkten
Mit einer riesigen Serverauswahl und guten Geschwindigkeiten kann CyberGhost als VPN-Dienstleister Ã¼berzeugen. Die Nutzung garantiert ein HÃ¶chstmaÃŸ an Sicherheit und AnonymitÃ¤t im Web. Positiv...
-
Firmensitz: RumÃ¤nien - Anzahl LÃ¤nder: 100
- VerfÃ¼gbare Server: 9500+
- Anzahl GerÃ¤te: 7
-
UnterstÃ¼tzte Protokolle: WireGuard, IKEv2, OpenVPN -
VerschlÃ¼sselung: AES 256-bit
Mehr Infos.
Laut Symantec wurden diese Apps mit sogenannten "hart kodierten" Zugangsdaten ausgeliefert. Das bedeutet, die App enthÃ¤lt unverschlÃ¼sselte Login-Informationen zu externen Cloud-Systemen. Jeder, der den Quell- oder BinÃ¤rcode analysieren kann - etwa Hacker - hat dadurch potenziellen Zugriff auf sensible Datenbanken. Die Folge: Kriminelle kÃ¶nnten auf eure persÃ¶nlichen Daten zugreifen, diese verÃ¤ndern oder sogar vollstÃ¤ndig abziehen, ohne dass ihr es bemerkt. Genau deshalb solltet ihr schnell handeln.
Diese Android-Apps sind betroffen
Symantec hat acht Android-Apps identifiziert, bei denen diese gravierende Schwachstelle besteht. Diese wurden insgesamt Ã¼ber 10 Millionen Mal installiert. Schaut selbst, ob eine davon auf eurem GerÃ¤t ist:
- Pic Stitch: Ãœber 5 Millionen Downloads
- Meru Cabs: Ãœber 5 Millionen Downloads
- Sulekha Business: Ãœber 500.000 Downloads
- ReSound Tinnitus Relief: Ãœber 500.000 Downloads
- Saludsa: Ãœber 100.000 Downloads
- Chola Ms Break In: Ãœber 100.000 Downloads
- EatSleepRIDE Motorcycle GPS: Ãœber 100.000 Downloads
- Beltone Tinnitus Calmer: Ãœber 100.000 Downloads
Schon eine einzige dieser Apps kann potenziell eure Daten preisgeben - selbst wenn ihr sie nur gelegentlich nutzt.
Virenschutz 2025 im HÃ¤rtetest: Wer macht wirklich dicht?Die besten Antivirensuiten 2025
6 Anbieter, zig Versprechen: Wir haben die aktuellen Security-Suiten und VPN-Erweiterungen durchleuchtet. Wo ihr echten Rundum-Schutz bekommt - und wer nur mit Billigpreisen fÃ¼rs erste Jahr lockt.
Auch iOS-Apps sind nicht sicher
Auch im Apple App Store wurden fÃ¼nf riskante Anwendungen gefunden. Sie wurden zwar nicht so hÃ¤ufig heruntergeladen, aber allein durch die Vielzahl an Bewertungen wird klar, wie verbreitet sie trotzdem sind:
- Crumbl: Ãœber 3,9 Millionen Bewertungen
- Eureka - Verdiene Geld fÃ¼r Umfragen: Ãœber 402.100 Bewertungen
- Videoshop : Video Editor: Ãœber 357.900 Bewertungen
- Solitaire Clash - Gewinne echtes Geld: Ãœber 244.800 Bewertungen
- Zap Surveys - Verdiene leicht Geld: Ãœber 235.000 Bewertungen
Auch hier gilt: Die Nutzung allein bedeutet nicht automatisch, dass ihr bereits betroffen seid - aber die Gefahr ist real, wenn die Entwickler keine Updates liefern.
Warum ihr die Apps besser lÃ¶schen solltet
Zwar sind die betroffenen Apps nicht mit Schadsoftware verseucht, aber gerade das macht sie so tÃ¼ckisch. Sie wirken vertrauenswÃ¼rdig und sind offiziell Ã¼ber Google Play oder den App Store erhÃ¤ltlich. Die SicherheitslÃ¼cke entsteht durch die im Code hinterlegten Zugangsdaten fÃ¼r Cloud-Dienste.
Angreifer kÃ¶nnten diese Daten extrahieren, um auf Datenbanken mit sensiblen Informationen zuzugreifen. Zum Beispiel E-Mail-Adressen, Nutzungsdaten oder auch Bilder und Kontakte. Die einfachste SchutzmaÃŸnahme: LÃ¶scht die betroffenen Apps.
Es ist nicht das erste Mal, dass Symantec solche Schwachstellen aufdeckt. Bereits 2022 entdeckte das Unternehmen Ã¼ber 1.800 Apps mit Ã¤hnlichen Problemen. 77 Prozent davon enthielten gÃ¼ltige Cloud-Zugangsdaten im Code. Die Gefahr durch solche Programmierfehler wird also noch immer unterschÃ¤tzt.
NotfalllÃ¶sung: VPN
Falls ihr eine dieser Apps unbedingt behalten wollt, solltet ihr zumindest zusÃ¤tzliche SicherheitsmaÃŸnahmen treffen. Ein VPN (Virtual Private Network) wie ExpressVPN oder CyberGhost VPN kann euch dabei helfen, eure Verbindung zu verschlÃ¼sseln und eure IP-Adresse zu verschleiern. Zwar schÃ¼tzt ein VPN nicht direkt vor schlecht programmierten Apps, aber es erschwert den Datenzugriff Ã¼ber unsichere Netzwerke erheblich.
Sicher, schnell, anonym: Das sind die besten VPN-Dienste 2025GroÃŸer VPN-Test: ExpressVPN siegt - Surfshark Ã¼berrascht mit Top-Preis
Anonym surfen, Inhalte weltweit freischalten und sensible Daten absichern - mit einem guten VPN kein Problem. Doch welcher Dienst ist der beste? Unser groÃŸer Test zeigt, worauf es ankommt.
Langfristig solltet ihr jedoch regelmÃ¤ÃŸig eure Apps Ã¼berprÃ¼fen und darauf achten, ob sie Updates erhalten oder von vertrauenswÃ¼rdigen Entwicklern stammen. Sicherheit beginnt nicht erst beim Hackerangriff, sondern bei der richtigen App-Auswahl.
Diese 13 Apps mÃ¼sst ihr sofort lÃ¶schen

title: Bodega Aurrera pone baratÃ­simo el aceite Nutrioli para la cena de AÃ±o Nuevo | Radio FÃ³rmula
text: Un buen aceite de cocina es la clave para cualquier platillo, pues este, en muchos de los casos, es el inicio de todas las recetas. Si buscas un producto de calidad y que ademÃ¡s estÃ© a un muy buen precio, entonces Nutrioli es tu opciÃ³n, ademÃ¡s se encuentra a un [increÃ­ble precio en Bodega AurrerÃ¡](https://www.radioformula.com.mx/estilo-de-vida/2023/12/28/bodega-aurrera-vende-baratisima-esta-chamarra-ideal-para-lluvia-frio-viento-795488.html). Esta tienda nos ha sorprendido con toda serie de promociones en diversos productos que te ayudarÃ¡n a preparar tu cena de AÃ±o Nuevo, incluso en utensilios o muebles que equiparÃ¡n de la mejor manera tu cocina. Uno de los productos con mÃ¡s demanda en todas las cocinas mexicanas es el aceite, el cual se termina de forma rÃ¡pida y es necesario surtirlo, por lo menos, una vez a la semana. Te podrÃ­a interesar Si este es tu caso, entonces la promociÃ³n que actualmente tiene Bodega AurrerÃ¡ es para ti. Se trata una botella de acuite Nutrioli de 946 ml, "ideal para tus creaciones culinarias diarias". "Enriquecido con omegas 3, 6 y 9, que son beneficiosos para tu salud. Contiene Vitamina E, un antioxidante natural que cuida de ti y tu familia. Sin colesterol, proviene de fuentes vegetales para una alimentaciÃ³n mÃ¡s equilibrada", se lee en la descripciÃ³n de esta tienda departamental. El precio de catÃ¡logo de este producto es de 54 pesos; sin embargo, por temporada, podrÃ¡s adquirirlo por tan solo 46 pesitos directo en tienda o en el portal oficial de Bodega AurrerÃ¡.

author: Chris Queen
title: Progressive Christianity Watch: Oooh, Witchy Woman (Pastor) and One Woke Church Has Had Enough
text:
Last week, I brought you the first installment in what I think is going to be a regular series uncovering the ridiculousness of progressive Christianity. Progressive theology and progressive politics often go hand in hand. This week, weâ€™ll start with one of those instances where a pastor emphasized his progressivism a little too much, and his woke church finally had enough of it.
In a wealthy Charlotte, N.C., neighborhood lies Myers Park Baptist Church. This congregation is woke as a joke. The churchâ€™s tagline is â€œInclusivity I Spirituality I Community I Justice,â€ and it features rainbow accents on signs on the building. A sign on the sidewalk in front of the church reads, â€œJesus was an undocumented immigrant, just saying...â€ (He wasnâ€™t.)
Pastor Benjamin Boswell had been at the church for nine years, but a sermon he gave back in November made some in his congregation uncomfortable. NPR reports:
Boswell likened the moment to what he called the "gathering dark of Hitler's rule." He added that Trump's election would lead to the "crucifixion" of immigrant families as well as transgender and nonbinary people.
"But our faith also teaches us â€¦ that every crucifixion needs a witness," Boswell said. "The fight is not over, it's just beginning."
Members werenâ€™t happy with Boswellâ€™s comments at a recent seminar on racial issues in which the pastor said the church needed to â€œdecolonizeâ€ its sanctuary and become less â€œWASPy.â€ The church board recently fired Boswell.
Congregants said that they were tired of Boswell guilt-tripping them and making every sermon political; some also said that he was a good preacher but a bad pastor. The board pointed to the 42% decrease in attendance since Boswell became pastor. It doesnâ€™t take a theologian or a statistician to know that all those issues are related.
One young church member said that the division in the church reminded him of the current schism in the Democratic Party. NPR reports that â€œBoswell says the conflict at Myers Park is part of a much bigger national trend to roll back diversity, equity, and inclusion programs.â€
The truth is that things might have been different if Boswell had been more concerned about the gospel and discipleship than about left-wing virtue signaling. But weâ€™ll never really know.
Related: Progressive Christianity Watch: Trans Lord's Prayer, DEI Babylon, and Who's Afraid of Losing Federal Cash
Next, weâ€™ll turn to the Evangelical Lutheran Church in America (ELCA), which might be the most left-leaning denomination. Add that this story comes from San Francisco, and youâ€™ve got the craziest church story youâ€™ll read all week.
Protestia reports that an ELCA congregation in the Sierra Pacific Synod has witches on staff and practices pagan rituals:
Founded initially as Ebenezer Lutheran Church by Swedish immigrants in 1884, the church served the community for many years until Rev. Stacy Boorn took over. Ordained in 1987, Boorn describes herself as a â€œPastor & Priestess of Ritualâ€ and claims that her â€œmalestream theological education opened the door for her to build a Goddess-inclusive congregation and ministry.â€
Inhabited by several legions of demons, sheâ€™s remade the church into her image, painting it purple in 2010 and giving it its new moniker to â€œhonor the Goddess and Divine Feminine,â€ be in â€œsolidarity with women and all persons who are oppressed and denied equal rights,â€ and to â€œadvocate for marriage rights for all people.â€
The church now goes by herchurch and includes a litany of evil, un-Christian practices like invocations, chants, and healing circles, along with some dumb left-wing events like BIPOC content creation and drum circles. The staff is nearly all female with one exception.
Protestia reports that â€œleaders include Priestess Alice Heimsoth, the â€˜Documentarian Priestess for herchurch, artistically chronicling the community and its memberâ€™s connection to the Divine Feminine,â€™ and Priestexx Thom Longino, the â€˜adjunct pastor, spiritual director, Goddexx enthusiast, avid crocheter, Br Lilith of the Order of Ecumenical Franciscans, and occasional Night Minister.â€™â€
But the real kicker is Christine Konkol, the churchâ€™s â€œResident Witch.â€ No, seriously. Her bio states:
As Priestess Witch for herchurch, Christine offers magical gifts to share and enhance the support and development of herchurch. The monthly astrological reading provides guidance from the stars and is a favorite among many. Together we honor the natural cycles of the year, the Solstices and Equinoxes, and thank the Earth for her bounty. Small group gatherings provide inspiration and direct our attention to instinct and intuition helping us to discover ways to connect to the divinity of nature and thereby the Divine.
Yâ€™all, these people arenâ€™t Christians. This is pagan evil, pure and simple. How does the ELCA keep these heretics in fellowship? (I think we know the answer to that question.)
Flashback: The Left Will Devour Itself: ELCA Calls for Resignation of Trans Bishopâ€”But Not for the Reason You Think
Finally, we turn to something that may or may not qualify as progressive Christianity, but itâ€™s still dumb as all get out. Rick â€œI want to bully the Southern Baptist Convention into ordaining women because I like women pastorsâ€ Warren posted this nonsense on X:
John 19:18 â€œThey crucified Jesus with two others-one on each side & Jesus in the middle.â€
â€” Rick Warren (@RickWarren)
The guys on both sides were thieves.
If youâ€™re looking for the[#realJesus], not a caricature disfigured by partisan motivations, youâ€™ll find him in the middle, not on either side.[pic.twitter.com/wYmLyayqsZ][February 11, 2025]
How asinine could he get? Jesusâ€™ position on the middle cross was not Godâ€™s political statement. The men on either side of him were not on the left or right because they were thieves. Letâ€™s also not forget that one of the two thieves asked Jesus for forgiveness.
The reaction to Warrenâ€™s stupid post was strong:
This is an example of proof texting scripture so badly that you should be embarsssed to call yourself a pastor.
â€” Jenna Ellis ðŸŠ (@realJennaEllis)
Jesus is not a moderate or â€œin the middleâ€ when it comes to truth. To characterize him as such simply because of the placement of his cross is perverting an historicalâ€¦[February 12, 2025]
Pastor Rick, I'm not sure it is wise to fall into what so many on the left and right do and use our current political spectrum to frame Christ in moderation instead of being at the center of our shared story.
â€” Erick Erickson (@EWErickson)[February 12, 2025]
Huh? This makes zero sense.
â€” Becket Cook (@becketcook)[February 12, 2025]
I don't always think you deserve the criticism you get, but you definitely deserve to get dragged for mangling this story to fit the message you wanted to push.
â€” John Hawkins (@johnhawkinsrwn)[February 12, 2025]
Allow me explain for anyone scratching their heads.
â€” Shaun Marksbury (@marksbury)
This is an eisegetical reading of the Passion account. Warren asks you to reimagine the thieves as representing the political parties which would exist in American some 20 centuries later.
Warren, who's interviewed Barackâ€¦[February 11, 2025]
Too many people on both sides of the political aisle try to claim Jesus for their sides, which is always silly. But itâ€™s equally vapid and foolish for Warren to claim that Jesus occupies the wimpy, mushy middle.
Thatâ€™s it for this week. I think this might become a weekly feature; after all, thereâ€™s plenty of low-hanging fruit among progressive Christians.

author: Vordev
title: CMC Surgeon Suspended for Eight Months Due to Negligence - CuraÃ§ao Chronicle
text:
WILLEMSTAD â€“ A surgeon at CuraÃ§ao Medical Center (CMC) has been suspended for eight months, with four months conditional, due to negligence in post-operative care of a patient. The Medical Disciplinary Board had initially issued a reprimand, but the Court of Justice imposed a stricter penalty on appeal. The Inspectorate of Public Health was involved in the case, highlighting the severity of the accusations.
The case dates back to 2009, when the patient underwent surgery at the now-closed Taams Clinic. While the court ruled that the surgical procedure itself was not flawed, the surgeon's post-operative care was deemed careless. The patient was discharged too early, her complaints were downplayed, and elevated blood values were ignored. Additionally, the transfer of her medical records was handled poorly, and she was not properly informed about her condition.
The Court described the surgeonâ€™s actions as indifferent and unprofessional. Due to the lack of proper care in CuraÃ§ao, the patient was forced to seek treatment in Venezuela. While the court acknowledged the long duration of the legal process, the severity of the negligence ultimately led to the harsh suspension.
The Medical Disciplinary Board in CuraÃ§ao has the authority to impose various disciplinary measures on healthcare providers for negligence or misconduct. The harshest penalty is removal from the medical register (BIG-register), effectively banning the doctor from practicing. Other possible sanctions include a warning, reprimand, fines up to â‚¬4,500, or suspensions of up to one year. In this case, the eight-month suspension is a significant punishment, though not the maximum possible.
